# bnmr
<!-- badges: start -->
[![Travis build status](https://travis-ci.org/philip-khor/bnmr.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/philip-khor/bnmr)
<!-- badges: end -->
  
The goal of bnmr is to provide a set of convenient wrapper functions for the Central Bank of Malaysia's API. 

## Installation

You can install the released version of bnmr from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("bnmr")
```

For now, to install `bnmr`, do the following:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("philip-khor/bnmr")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r, message = FALSE}
library(bnmr)
current_base_rates <- base_rate()
head(current_base_rates)
```
